game.name: Saints Row: The Third
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam Cloud, Remote Play 휴대전화, Remote Play 태블릿, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Get ready for the most out-landish gameplay scenarios ever seen as the Third Street Saints take on the Syndicate!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Get ready for the most out-landish gameplay scenarios ever seen as the Third Street Saints take on the Syndicate!

reviewHighlights.text: 답답해 뒤질 거 같음 절대 하지 마삼 그냥 버그 씨발 암걸리네 진짜
